message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $12,000, but I'm open to discussing the price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product is high to you, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a little more than that. Would you consider $11,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to meet at $11,000. I would like to counter with $10,500 for the product. I hope this helps us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
